import React, { Component } from 'react'; import{Link}from '../routes'; import Navbar from 'react-bootstrap/Navbar'; import Nav from 'react-bootstrap/Nav'; import Container from 'react-bootstrap/Nav'; import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form'; import FormControl from 'react-bootstrap/FormControl'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import DatePicker from "react-datepicker"; import web3 from '../ethereum/web3' import {Router}from '../routes'; import vote from '../ethereum/vote'; class admin extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state ={ register_start_date:'', register_end_date:'', vote_start_date:'', vote_end_date:'', requirement:'', question:'', option:'', loading : false, loading2: false, errorMessage:'' }; //console.log(props.query.address);//擷取這個網址的url那part的address(from routes??) //this.render_join = this.render_join.bind(this); } onsubmit(){ } render() { return( <> Vote
Home Status
inesrt your vote contract address here ->
The Issue you want to vote {/* gap time entrance fee */} register_start_date register_end_date vote_start_date vote_end_date vote requirement
candidate1 candidate1's policy
) } } export default admin;
